tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pediatric Dentistry,Kids Root  Canals,childrens dentistry,Child teeth problem,Management of Early childhood caries,
review: I am ever grateful to Pediatric Dentist Dr. Sony Mishra ji for the excellent dental treatment she has provided for my children. I had seen 2 dentists earlier but somehow was not fully satisfied with the treatment and their management of my child's problems. But Dr. Sony's approach worked like magic. She was able to quickly gain the confidence of the children and her treatment planning as well as exceution has also left me super satisfied. I never imagined children looking forward to going to a dentist but that is the kind of bond Dr. Sony Aunty manages to create with her kid parients. Dr. Sony Mishra is a blessing as a Pedodontist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Gap Closing,Teeth Whitening,Veneers / Laminates,Ceramic Veneers / Crowns ,
review: Absolutely satisfied with all the results of all my cosmetic dental treatment and thrilled with the results. I had very odd-looking gaps in my front teeth and they appeared a little dull discolored too. Dr. Sony checked me and planned her treatment which included teeth whitening and closing the gaps and uneven alignment of my teeth with ceramic veneers. I never imagined I could have such a pleasant and appealing smile. Very economical costs and the results were beyond my expectations. Thanks to Dr Sony and her team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pediatric Dentistry,childrens dentistry,Kids Root  Canals,Pulpectomy,
review: It is difficult to express my gratitude and appreciation in words for the wonderful way in which Dr. Sony managed to handle the dental treatment needs of my child. We had been to 2 other Child Specialist Dentists earlier, but the treatment could not be done. The patience which Dr. Sony showed in putting our concerns at ease as well as handling all the fillings, fluoride application and root canal or pulp therapy that my child needed is very commendable. She is also very genuine and only suggests what is absolutely necessary without overhyping things. Nothing fancy..just the tender love and care kids need from their doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Management of Early childhood caries,Child teeth problem,childrens dentistry,Kids Root  Canals,
review: I am very happy with the way Dr. Sony took care of my child's dental problems. She was very gentle and caring and made the entire treatment experience very enjoyable and welcoming for my child. The root canal or pulp therapy treatment as well as fillings were completed with ease. My child was very apprehensive initially but later began really looking forward to visiting Sony Aunty.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pediatric Dentistry,Pediatric Tooth Extraction,Pediatric Space Maintainers,Child teeth problem,Kids Root  Canals,
review: As parents we often get worried when our children have any health issue. The problem gets more complicated if the child is uncooperative and doctors find doing the treatment difficult. My chiild was such a case and we had been advised by 2 other Pediatric Dentists that we must get the treatment done under GA or sedation and the treatment otherwise wasn't possible. Dr Sony was the third Consultant I visited as I wasn't convinced about the options suggested and didn't want my child to undergo all that. She is the most patient and kind soul I have met. While the first 2 or 3 appts were not very fruitful, but eventually she was able to win over the confidence of my child with her excellent behavior management. The treatment proceeded smoothly thereafter and fillings, pulp therapy treatment and extract ions were done as needed. So happy with her reassuring presence and all treatment outcomes. She is a blessing as a Pediatric Dentist. I have also got other treatment for myself and family done at her clinic thereafter. And my child loves coming back to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,Zirconia Crowns,Dental Crowns,Scaling / Polishing,
review:
It has been more than 10 years now that I am getting my treatment from Dr. Soni Mishra and I must say it has been a delightful experience always. 

Dr. Mishra is a thorough professional and highly skilled in all dental procedures which I have got from her so far i.e. Filling, Root Canal Treatment, Crowning and Scaling. I am sure with others procedures as well.

She has always carefully examined my problem and explained everything about the treatment before proceeding with it, which is quite comforting for me. It gives me more confidence going at the start. The end result has been amazing too and my tooth problem is always solved.

The clinic is also fantastic and well equipped with all modern equipments needed. My recent experience in getting the Crowning treatment was fantastic as the Clinic is now being run with strict Covid operating procedures. I was given a full body covering suit, foot cover, hand-gloves, head cover and only allowed into the premises after my temperature and oxygen level were measured. Only one patient was treated at a time with strict sanitisation of the procedure room and equipments . 

Lastly, Dr. Mishra gives a very good experience holistically every-time I go for any kind of dental treatment. I have even travelled to Delhi sometimes to get my treatment (when I wasn't living here ) I highly recommend her for any Dental issues.
reply_text: Thank you so much Anmol. We are both honored and humbled. Honored because of the trust you and your famy have placed in us over so many years; and humbled by the great length and depth you went to with your feedback. Such words encourage and motivate us, but at the same time they also set the bar one notch higher for us. We promise to try our best to live upto the praise you shower us with.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Cavity Filling,Cosmetic Veneers/Bonding,Teeth Whitening,
review: Excellent treatment done by Dr. Sony. Gaps in my teeth are closed beautifully and my smile appears so much nicer now. The costing was very affordable and the advice was very genuine. All the choices were given to me. I recommend her to all for cosmetic dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Gap Closing,Widely Spaced Teeth,Ceramic Veneers / Crowns ,Laser Assisted Teeth whitening,Smile Designing,
review: It has been a wonderful treatment experience at this clinic with Dr Sony. I had spacing in my front teeth and they were very discolored. I wasn't happy at all with the way they looked. Had consulted 1 or 2 dentists earlier but somehow wasn't sure of their recommendations and also the charges. Then I saw Dr Sony Mishra. I liked her approach of handling a case like mine and all the suggestions she gave. Ultimately she has done Teeth Whitening and then closed the gaps with Cermaic or Porcelain Veneerw. I am very happy now and extremely thankful to her for everything. Its a great clinic without any unnecessary grandeur and with very reasonable charges.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pediatric Dentistry,Kids Root  Canals,Cosmetic Veneers/Bonding,Veneers / Laminates,Smile Design,
review:
I have seen Dr Sony for my child's Root Canal or Pulp Therapy as they call it. Thereafter, she has also done fillings for her as well as Fluoride Treatment. She us very with children. Her approach is gentle and the treatment planning precise. My daughter loves going back to her and it is so nice to see that compared to earlier when she dreaded a visit to the dentist. Now she looks forward to meeting her Sony Aunty.
After my child's treatment I approached her for my Smile Correction. I had some gaps in my teeth and they were a bit uneven. But in just 3 visits she transformed my smile with a combination of Teeth Whitening, Ceramic Veneers and Bonding. Happy to have found her for our dental treatment needs.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Cosmetic Filling,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,RCT - Single Sitting,Zirconia Crowns,Ceramic Veneers / Crowns ,
review: I have had a fabulous and most satisfying dental treatment experience at the clinic of Dr Ruchir and Dr Sony. They are extremely courteous and soft-spoken and handle all their patients with a lot of care. What is also remarkable is the clarity of their treatment plans and the great detail with which they communicate the same to their patients. I have had multiple treatment done for full mouth rehabilitation including fillings, RCTs and crowns as well as teeth removals. Everything went really well and the end result is quite like what they had indicated earlier. This is a great team of dental specialists. I am happy to recommend them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Missing Teeth,Dental Crowns,
review: I found the treatment very satisfied to the extent when we have less time I traveled all the way to Delhi from Manipur and during this short visit of a week the doctors make sure to get all the problems solved. I am happy to be treated by Dr.Sony Mishha Madam and Dr. Ruchir Mishra Sir during this very challenging time of Covid pandemic. I wish both the doctors a blessings to fulfil their endeavour of serving the humanity and a successful career ahead. Therefore, I recommend them to everyone to come and visit them if all of you wish to have your dental issues solve with with the best care and speedy recovery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Teeth Whitening,Smile Design,Porcelain Veneers,Cosmetic Veneers/Bonding,
review: My dental treatment was done by Dr. Sony. I was not comfortable with my smile and wanted some changes and improvements. I first went to a clinic which suggested lot of work and the pricing was quite expensive. Then after searching again online I found Dr Sony and visited her. In a very methodical manner she did the Consultation and explained the workflow. Happy with her explanation, I proceeded for the treatment. She did Teeth Whitening followed by correcting my upper front teeth with a combination of Ceramic Veneers and Composite Bonding. The end results are wow and thanks to her, I have received compliments for the same from friends and family. She is a great Doctor and a gem of a person.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Cosmetic Filling,Gap Closing,Crooked Teeth,Smile Designing,
review: I am not from Delhi but was happy to find Dr Sony when I needed dental treatment. She had earlier done some filling and crown for my teeth. Later I came back to her to correct my smile. I had gaps between my front teeth and they were a little crooked. She diligently examined my case and came up with all possible options and then helped me decide what I wanted to go with. She has improved my smile so nicely with ceramic veneers and bonding treatment. I am so happy with the smile now and I can't thank her enough. Their pricing is also very genuine and they are so transparent with all the planning. They help and involve the patients as well in finalizing things. Great experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Cosmetic Filling,Zirconia Crowns,Veneers, Crowns and Bridges,
review: It has been a very pleasant experience visiting Dr Sony Mishra and her husband Dr Ruchir for my dental treatment. They are so warm and caring with everything they do that it really makes one feel at ease while being treated at Smilekraft. I got some cosmetic tooth colored fillings and RCT done by her and she has also placed Zirconia crowns for me. She has also done a lot of treatment for my son. There are so many positives about the entire dental treatment experience that its difficult to enumerate here. She is highly recommended with pleasure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Cosmetic Filling,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Ceramic Veneers / Crowns ,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review: My grandson first visited Dr. Sony for a cosmetic treatment he required at very short notice and she was able to do a very good job. Thereafter me and my wife have taken treatment here for multiple dental issues. I got treatment for my tooth sensitivity and many fillings done here. RCT was also done for me in single sitting and my wife needed 2 sittings. I also got Ceramic Crowns fixed for my teeth and my wife got a bridge of 4 caps. All the treatment went really fine and we are thoroughly satisfied and happy with their treatment as well as their very caring and helpful nature. God Bless Dr. Sony and Dr. Ruchir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Tooth Coloured Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Crowns,Zirconia Crowns,
review: I have always been very satisfied with Dr Sony and Dr Ruchir Mishra at Smilekraft. I have now been their patients for 3-4 years and have found their approach very genuine and all the treatment prices very reasonable. I have many dental issues and got fillings, RCT and crowns done from them. All the treatment has been very comfortable. I have been patients of 2 other top dentists in Delhi before seeing Dr. Sony. But now I highly recommend her. What I like most is the effort they put in trying to save teeth at all costs rather than suggesting to remove them and put implants. God Bless them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Gap Closing,Porcelain Veneers,Cosmetic Veneers/Bonding,Smile Designing,
review: I have the great privilege of writing this review for a doctor who simply wowed me with the entire treatment experience. I had multiple issues with my teeth and just did not like the way I smiled. I was contemplating treatment for a long while and after a lot of research, zeroed in on 3 dentists. After visiting each of them and discussing the plan and my options with them, I found Dr. Sony and Dr. Ruchir's approach most convincing and well-structured. They gave me multiple options and discussed all the nuances in great detail. Having satisfied myself, I went ahead with my smile makeover. They did a session of Teeth Whitening and followed that up with ceramic Veneers for my teeth. My smile has turned from something I always hid to something I love to flaunt. I must make a special mention of their attitude and the way they reach out to you to allay your fears and make you feel completely at ease. Thank you so much Dr. Sony..you will forever be my favorite dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Veneers / Laminates,Laser Assisted Teeth whitening,Cosmetic Veneers/Bonding,Smile Designing,
review: Super happy with the Smile Designing treatment done for me by Dr Sony Mishra. I had got Teeth Whitening done and it was followed by placement of Ceramic Veneers for my upper front teeth and a procedure called Cosmetic Bonding which she did for my 4 front lower teeth. The final outcome was very satisfying for me and I am happy to recommend her only because of the compliment s I have been receiving for my smile since the treatment. The pricing is also very reasonable and the entire experience was smooth and really comfortable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Gap Closing,Crooked Teeth,Smile Design,
review: I have had great treatment experience with Dr Sony Mishra and her clinic. Had approached them for smile correction since I did not want to go for braces. She looked at the while problem holistically and gave me 2 different treatment plans to choose. My final treatment was done with Ceramic Veneers and Teeth Whitening and the results are way beyond my expectation. I am so happy and thankful for the Smile Makeover that has been done and would gladly recommend Dr. Sony and Dr. Ruchir Mishra to anyone who is looking for a class team of Cosmetic Dentist. I always felt I was in safe hands and the care and concern they show as well as the clarity of thought they have is amazing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Child teeth problem,Management of Early childhood caries,
review: We have visited her for cavities in the teeth for children. The whole treatment experience was very satisfying and comfortable. All the advice given was very genuine and the entire process was very nicely explained to us before starting the treatment. We were made aware of all options and the results of the procedures have been very good. The appointment scheduling and other issues were also handled well by Dr. Sony and her Smilekraft clinic. It is a pleasure to recommend a Pedodontist like Dr. Sony Mishra.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pediatric Dentistry,Kids Root  Canals,childrens dentistry,
review: My grandchild was being treated at a clinic for 2 months but the problem was not resolved. Eventually when her pain and swelling increased, I looked online for the most highly rated pediatric dentist and found Dr. Sony Mishra. They immediately gave us an appointment since it was an emergency and the initial problem was very well taken care of. Thereafter, Dr. Sony took care of all the remaining treatment in multiple visits and all the issues have now been successfully resolved thanks to her expert care and guidance. She has done RCT and fillings and guided us regarding preventing further issues. I wish her and their Smilekraft clinic well and happily recommend them.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review:
Dr Sony has all the qualities and skill set a competent and experienced dentist should have. When I visited their clinic, I found all COVID19 protocols were in place. 
Dr Sony apprised me of the diffrent options of treatment and ably guided me to the best possible option, considering my condition as a senior citizen.
Dr Sony conducted the root canal procedure; during procedure my comfort level was very good.
I have the doctor Sony and Dr Ruchir to be very transparent in their dealings.
Both of them were very nice to me. I appreciate their treatment and highly recommend them.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your words of appreciation Uncle. Both Dr. Ruchir and I were also very happy to have you at our clinic. It was a pleasure treating you and we wish you the best of health for the future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Cavities,
review: Doc Sony is a remarkable doctor. she made my 4-yr extremely comfortable. She has great skills around kids.The treatment was done without any fuss. She explained the treatment well and patiently answered all queries. I highly recommend doctor Sony.Side notes:- I find their clinic charges reasonable and great value for the service they offer.- They took exceptional care in ensuring that Covid does not spread in their clinic. Everyone was wearing protective gear and the doctors were themselves taking care of every minute detail.
reply_text: Thank you so much for the kind words. It is indeed special when parents appreciate the multiple things we do to keep to keep our little ones safe in these difficult times while at the same time trying our best to address all their treatment needs as painlessly and as efficiently as possible. God Bless lil Z. 🙂

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Composite tooth filling,
review: Both me and my husband have been their old patients. They have done RCTs, crown and fillings for us. Dr Sony is very gentle and has given excellent treatment results with whate or treatment she has done for us. Her husband Dr. Ruchir has also done surgical teeth removal for me. We both are greatly satisfied and happily recomend both of them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Tooth Coloured Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Porcelain-Fused-to-Metal Dental Crowns,Dental Implant,
review: I have always been satisfied with all the treatment here. Very honest doctors and genuine treatment plans with appropriate pricing. Dental fillings, RCT and crown were done for me and Implants for someone in my family. All went well and they took very good care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Paedodontics,
review:
Dr Soni is very friendly and makes kids so comfortable that the treatment becomes very easy. She spent good time and explained the issue well with all possibilities of next course of action.
Ethical practice which is very rare these days....highly satisfied.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Beautiful experience! Dr. Sony & Dr. Ruchir will make you feel so comfortable. Perfect treatment with all their patience and care. I used to travel from Gurgaon to NFC every time but trust me worth investing my time. I strongly recommend to go with Smilekraft to get guaranteed results. Excellent work!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Porcelain-Fused-to-Metal Dental Crowns,
review: I have got a lot of treatment done here for both myself and my wife. Dr. Ruchir has done tooth removal for me and Dr. Sony has done RCT and caps for my teeth. I have always been very satisfied with their treatment. I also really like their nature and the way they talk to and take care of their patients. The pricing is also economical. Very happy to recommend them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Laser Assisted Teeth whitening,Veneers / Laminates,Composite Bondings,Smile Designing,
review: I have visited Dr Sony for a Smile makeover because of gaps in my front teeth and some discoloration.She performed LASER teeth whitening and then worked on the gaps with combination of ceramic veneers and tooth colored bonding. The final results make me very happy and were exactly as Dr Sony had described them. The pricing is also reasonable and the overall experience very pleasant.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pediatric Dentistry,Kids Root  Canals,Fluoride Therapy,
review: I am super happy with the experience at Smilekraft with Dr Sony and her team. My grandson was treated here. He needed some preventive fluoride treatment alongwith 2 root canals and cavity fillings. She finally did crowns for the 2 teeth. Everything was done very painlessly and comfortably for him. Dr. Sony has a special way with kids and it really helps to make the kids comfortable. Highly recommend them for all children and pediatric dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Wisdom Teeth,
review: I had been delaying my appointment because of the lockdown and was concerned about safety. But once I visited, I was glad to find out how well the safety measures had been taken care of and distancing was being practiced. I had a great experience with Dr.Sony. She was really friendly and helped me understand my problem and how we should proceed to treat it. I am content with the advice she gave me and would totally recommend the place.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are happy we could guide you well regarding the problem as well as its solutions. It is indeed heartening to know that you appreciated our advice and approach and found the Novel Corona Virus related arrangements in place and up to the mark.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Cosmetic Veneers/Bonding,
review:
I wanted to reduce the gapping in my front tooth and was skeptical for braces. Dr. Sony suggested for veneering procedure and motivated me to keep my broad and big smile 😀. 
The whole procedure was done in a couple of hours and was pain-free. She is really good at what she does and they took all the precautions at the clinic (considering the present scenario). 
Thankyou so much Doctor, it was worth the trip! 😊
reply_text: Thank you so much for sharing your thoughts. It was a pleasure seeing you. We appreciate the trust you placed in us to drive down hundreds of kilometers to come and see us. We are happy we could live up to your expectations and give you a smile yoy can proudly flaunt. We would also like to thank you for subsequently referring your friend to us. Take Care and God Bless.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Teeth Whitening,Crooked Teeth,Ceramic Veneers / Crowns ,Cosmetic Veneers/Bonding,
review: This was a great dental treatment experience and I am very happy to share my feedback. I was looking for a Smile Makeover prior to my wedding. Since I didn't have time for Braces or Aligners, I was looking for a good hand at Cosmetic Dentistry. I found Dr Sony online. U was very reassured after my first visit that I was in safe hands. She has such a disarming nature and an assuring presence. She and Dr Ruchir crafted a good treatment plan and discussed all the details with me. Thereafter, we first did Teeth Whitening followed by a combination of Ceramic Veneers for 4 teeth and Composite Bonding for 2 more. The final results were quite in line with ny expectations and I am super thrilled I chose her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Widely Spaced Teeth,Gap Closing,Cosmetic Veneers/Bonding,Porcelain Veneers,
review: Super happy with the entire treatment experience at Smilekraft Clinic by Dr. Sony Mishra and her team. The gaps between my upper front teeth always bothered me and I visited Dr. Sony after having consulted 2 other Cosmetic Dentists. But the comprehensiveness of treatment planning by Dr Sony and the fact that she gave me all possible options and discussed their pros and cons at length really impressed me. Went ahead with her for the treatment and the end result was great. Will highly recommend them for their easy going nature, accommodative attitude, honest and transparent dealing and a wonderful overall experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: **** ** ** ********* ****** ****** *** ** ** ****** *** **** ******* They have a state of the art setup to tackle most dental issues. Both the doctors are extremely proficient with great expertise. Even during pandemic times they have restarted with all precautions for the patients and one feels very safe. They are very caring and spend a lot of time in discussing the problems with patients and reassuring them. Dr Sony Mishra has additional specialisation & expertise in dealing with paediatric (Children) patients. I would highly recommend this clinic for whosoever needs dental treatment.

Dr. Sony Mishra has done many fillings, RCT and crowns for my teeth. The treatment has always been comfortable and painless and they take very good care of their patients. The charges are fair and reasonable as well and I give them all my blessings and good wishes.

review: Dr Sony Mishra has exhibited exceptional professionalism from the very first meeting.  Where almost all the other dentists rushed to conclusions; Dr Sony relied on proper investigation first before suggesting not just the treatment but the treatment roadmap.  I’m getting my 4YO twins treated by her.  RCTs are what I dreaded but now it’s been 3 RCTs between the two of my kids along with other treatments.  It’s been a great experience till date.

tags: Value for money,
context: Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review:
Clinic was so unclean but still there prices are touching the sky .
Will never recommend to anyone. *** ***** ***** ** *** ***** **** *
reply_text:
This is a completely unfair and unfounded feedback. You talk about our prices when you only visited us for a Consultation. Before your visit, you had already had a long and detailed conversation with us and we helped you as much as we could without charging you a penny for that. You even wanted a precise treatment plan on the phone which we said could only be possible after we examined a few things. You already knew about your Consultation Fees (which is the only payment you ever made to us). If you thought even our Consultation Fees was high, you could have chosen to not visit us. 
And the clinic cleanliness bit of course appears like an afterthought. No one in all these years of our practice has ever had anything adverse to say on that account. We only hope you are fair and honest in your assessment. God Bless and Stay Healthy!
